name: Nckathleen.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome the online portfolio of Kathleen Rauh.

This repo contains the assignments and final project I did while a Python student at The Iron Yard in Durham, NC.  

Upon graduating from the University of Notre Dame, I began a career as a management information consultant with what is now known as Accenture. However, moves for my husband's job and having three children required several years as a stay-at-home mom.  Now I'm back and looking for a job as a junior developer / support engineer / product analyst in the Raleigh-Durham, NC area.

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kathleen-rauh-915b11104

My resume can be found[ here ](https://github.com/nckathleen/nckathleen.github.io/blob/master/KathleenRauhResume.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
